Constructor.

Parameters:
integer $cols: Amount of columns of the table
integer $start: initial record to show
integer $limit: final record to show
string $filter: field name of the database table.
integer $numRows: number of total rows of the search
string $content: content to search
string $order: field to organize the data of the table

Add each row generates dynamically from database records obtained.

string $table Table name of data base
array $arr Array with the data extracted in the SQL Sentence

string $divName Name div to display the grid.

Add the line with the search form and the button to add a new record.

Parameters:
string $table Table name of data base
array $fieldsFromSearch Its contains the values from "SELECT" search form.
array $fieldsFromSearchShowAs Its contains the labels show in the "SELECT" search form.
boolen $withNewButton If = 0, then not print the "New Record" button.
Returns:
none

xajaxGrid::render (   ) 
 

It combines the variables $this->search .

$this->top . $this->header . $this->rows . $this->footer to create the table with the data.

xajaxGrid::setFooter (   ) 
 

Add the footer of the table (Grid), that its contains the record information such as number of records, previos, next and final, totals records, etc.

Each one with its link when it is posible.

Set a header Table with attributes on the variable "header" of the class.

string $class the clas style

array $attribs array that contain the attributes for the headers.
array $events array that contain the events on this labels.
